mapper.insert: insert into passage (title, sub_title, content, cover) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sub_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT passage_id, title, sub_title, create_time, update_time, cover FROM passage

SELECT passage.passage_id, passage.title, passage.sub_title, passage.create_time, passage.update_time, passage.cover FROM passage INNER JOIN passage_tag on passage_tag.passage_id = passage.passage_id WHERE passage_tag.tag_id = #{tag_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
